entry.title: Weather God

entry.content:
History in an overview: 1653 ‚Äì Brandenburgians build the first Festung Kolberg; the city deteriorates. 1761 ‚Äì Russians capture Ko≈Çobrzeg during the Seven Years War. 1807 ‚Äì Festung Kolberg defends itself for over two months during the Napoleon‚Äôs invasion of Prussia. 1872 ‚Äì the stronghold gets pulled down; 60¬†years of prosperity happens. 1933 ‚Äì NSDAP wins the elections, Hitler becomes the city‚Äôs honorary citizen, Festung Kolberg gets rebuilt. 1943 ‚Äì Germans pull thousands of troops from the front lines to roll the last epic propaganda movie, Kolberg. 1945 ‚Äì Zhukov‚Äôs army sieges the city for two weeks, destroying 95% of its buildings. 1987 ‚Äì during the clearing of the Parsƒôta river-bed, Polish army blows up the three-centuries-old shooting gallery (scheduled for rebuilding which never happened).

I believe Ko≈Çobrzeg should reevaluate their approach to military in the future.
